sentences: Arst 체tles, et see ravimi ohtlikud doosid on m체rgised.
Ohtlikud kiirgusdoosed on range kontrolli all.
context: The word 'ohtlikud' is the plural form of an adjective meaning 'dangerous', 'harmful', or 'toxic'. In the context provided, it appears before 'doosid' (doses), indicating dangerous/harmful/toxic doses. The '-d' ending indicates this is in the plural nominative case.
